channel.title: glazeruns TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

item.title: Lions and Tigers and Bears, oh no. I'm off to see the wizard. Still haven't decided on bear spray, but I did buy a small air horn. Everyone keeps saying no brown bears in the Crazy Mountains. Only black bears. But mountain lions scare me. My wife is going
item.description: Lions and Tigers and Bears, oh no. I'm off to see the wizard. Still haven't decided on bear spray, but I did buy a small air horn. Everyone keeps saying no brown bears in the Crazy Mountains. Only black bears. But mountain lions scare me. My wife is going

item.title: As a firefighter, I face intense situations that can take a toll on mental health, leading to PTSD. It's crucial to break the stigma around this issue by openly discussing our experiences and seeking help. Movement is medicine; regular exercise can signif
item.description: As a firefighter, I face intense situations that can take a toll on mental health, leading to PTSD. It's crucial to break the stigma around this issue by openly discussing our experiences and seeking help. Movement is medicine; regular exercise can signif

item.title: Finished Crazy Mountain 100 haven't slept in 38 hours more later #crazymountain100 #ultrarunner #runtok
item.description: Finished Crazy Mountain 100 haven't slept in 38 hours more later #crazymountain100 #ultrarunner #runtok

item.title: Happy Medal Monday what do you get for running 100 hard mountain miles in Montana? you get this amazing belt buckle and a lifetime of memories #crazymountain100 #runtok #ultrarunner
item.description: Happy Medal Monday what do you get for running 100 hard mountain miles in Montana? you get this amazing belt buckle and a lifetime of memories #crazymountain100 #runtok #ultrarunner

item.title: Running 100 miles solo and unsupported means carrying a lot of gear. You never know what you'll need, so it's best to pack a bit on the heavy side. In the end, I used almost everything except my med kit. It's better to be over-prepared than under-prepared
item.description: Running 100 miles solo and unsupported means carrying a lot of gear. You never know what you'll need, so it's best to pack a bit on the heavy side. In the end, I used almost everything except my med kit. It's better to be over-prepared than under-prepared

item.title: This week's edition was brought to you by David Goggins fans. Don't worry, there were a lot of running is bad for your knees comments too. And I look old. And I'm unhealthy. The usual suspects. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #hatersgonnahate #ultrarunn
item.description: This week's edition was brought to you by David Goggins fans. Don't worry, there were a lot of running is bad for your knees comments too. And I look old. And I'm unhealthy. The usual suspects. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #hatersgonnahate #ultrarunn

item.title: That was really hard. Here's the TL;DR version for those of you that can't watch the 8 minute version. I know long format isn't for everyone but I hate making part 1 and 2. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultrarunner #crazymountain100
item.description: That was really hard. Here's the TL;DR version for those of you that can't watch the 8 minute version. I know long format isn't for everyone but I hate making part 1 and 2. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultrarunner #crazymountain100

item.title: My goal is to be in and out of the aid station as fast as I can go. Unless it's over 200 miles or UTMB, I don't sit down. I reapply lube, slam some calories, drink my sparkling water, refill my bottles, refill my pack with calories, and keep moving. This
item.description: My goal is to be in and out of the aid station as fast as I can go. Unless it's over 200 miles or UTMB, I don't sit down. I reapply lube, slam some calories, drink my sparkling water, refill my bottles, refill my pack with calories, and keep moving. This

item.title: World championship of ultrarunning. UTMB 170km. They had a mud slide and we all had to run an extra 4 miles. I'll be going back in for the 5th time in 2 weeks. Can't wait, but I'm so nervous. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #Ultrarunner #Ultram
item.description: World championship of ultrarunning. UTMB 170km. They had a mud slide and we all had to run an extra 4 miles. I'll be going back in for the 5th time in 2 weeks. Can't wait, but I'm so nervous. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #Ultrarunner #Ultram

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
